title: Serghei Tvetcov’s Unexpected Detour to Gravel Racing: ‘I’m here for a different reason’
content:
The former domestic road pro wants to show that a chronic illness doesn't have to mean the end of doing what you love.

Read the full article at Serghei Tvetcov’s Unexpected Detour to Gravel Racing: ‘I’m here for a different reason’ on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
